predicate.note: Frames file for 'mend' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: agentive
example.text: Despite the harsh exchanges, the U.S. and China still seem *trace* to be looking for a way *trace* to mend relations, which have deteriorated into what Mr. Nixon referred to as ``the greatest crisis in Chinese-American relations'' since his initial visit to China 17 years ago.
example.arg: relations, which have deteriorated into what Mr. Nixon referred to as ``the greatest crisis in Chinese-American relations'' since his initial visit to China 17 years ago

example.name: ergative
example.text: It's a good thing John's bones mend quickly!
